name: Lost kitten (NxhzGames)
description:
In this game you are a kitten named meowwe, who loves cookies very much. Once a storm started in Kata town. The wind blew everything in its path, little kitten was carried away with its cookies...

Controls:

· move - wasd

· dash - left shift 

· menu - escape

Authors:

· NxhzGames

:))
